document.full_text: thousands of people in tech-savvy japan swamped the internet in the hours after a devastating earthquake and tsunami to tell loved ones they were safe, but social networking sites were also flooded with worries about an explosion at a nuclear plant.
document.title: will i be alive tomorrow, asks japanese woman on internet
lines_and_colors: thousands of people in tech-savvy japan swamped the internet in the hours after a devastating earthquake and tsunami to tell loved ones they were safe, but social networking sites were also flooded with worries about an explosion at a nuclear plant.
